unnormalised: Regarding solar rooftop subsidies, transparency is crucial. Disbursal delays, like those reported in Maharashtra on 10/10/2023, need addressing. The MNRE's updated guidelines from 01/04/2024 at 14:00 hrs should streamline the process for applicants like Mr. Sharma from Jaipur. Further, subsidies should fairly benefit all, including those in smaller towns like Kanpur. Regular audits, perhaps quarterly starting 01/07/2024, are suggested to maintain accountability. These measures will build public trust.
normalised: Regarding solar rooftop subsidies, transparency is crucial. Disbursal delays, like those reported in Maharashtra on tenth October two thousand and twenty three, need addressing. The M N R E's updated guidelines from first April two thousand and twenty four at two P M should streamline the process for applicants like Mister Sharma from Jaipur. Further, subsidies should fairly benefit all, including those in smaller towns like Kanpur. Regular audits, perhaps quarterly starting first July two thousand and twenty four, are suggested to maintain accountability. These measures will build public trust.
